con:restRequest.name: PUT_updatecategorydetails

con:config.script:
import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def TestCase = context.testCase def FilePath = "C:\\Folder_Automation\\ApiTraining\\TestData.xls"
Workbook WorkBook1 = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(FilePath)) Sheet Sheet1 = WorkBook1.getSheet(0)
log.info ("Workbook open") PropertiesTestStep = TestCase.getTestStepByName("Properties1") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("keyword", Sheet1.getCell(0,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("languageid", Sheet1.getCell(1,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("storeid", Sheet1.getCell(2,1).getContents()) log.info (Sheet1.getCell(2,1).getContents())

con:restRequest.name: AddingNewCategory
updatecategorydetails
